description:
The Syncfusion Numeric Up-Down control for Xamarin.Android provides up and down repeat buttons to increment and decrement values. This control respects UI culture and can be configured to display different formats like currency format, scientific format, and more.

Key features:
• FormatString: Input string can be formatted by using the format strings.
• Culture: Number format can be localized to any specific culture.
• AllowNull: Allows the user to set null value.
• ParserMode: Value gets parsed based on the parser mode

Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Android project only.

Learn more: https://www.syncfusion.com/xamarin-android-ui-controls/numericupdown?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Documentation: https://help.syncfusion.com/xamarin-android/sfnumericupdown/getting-started?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing
